title: Code Diplomatique Logo
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130303073126im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Naljepnica3_5511.gif)

I know that _Membre du service..._ is Optima. What about CD?
author: Manlio Napoli

comments.content: Well the C could be [Bureau Grotesque.](http://web.archive.org/web/20130303073126/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/bureau-grotesque/), and the D could be Clarendon, or another slab. A bit of a mess really!
Yes, really. Since I had to recreate it, I traced the C in Illustrator and modified Clarendon to get the D. Thank you.
That C seems to have gout.
